# iosxe_l2_vfi (Resource)

This resource can manage the L2 VFI configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxe_l2_vfi" "example" {
  name   = "TENANT-A"
  mode   = "manual"
  vpn_id = 20001
  neighbors = [
    {
      ip_address    = "172.16.255.2"
      encapsulation = "mpls"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `mode` (String) - Choices: `autodiscovery`, `manual`, `point-to-point`
- `neighbors` (Attributes List) VFI neighbor configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbors))
- `vpn_id` (Number) VPN id
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbors`

Required:

- `ip_address` (String)

Optional:

- `encapsulation` (String) Connection encapsulation type
  - Choices: `l2tpv3`, `mpls`

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxe_l2_vfi.example "<name>"
```
